Text: This is a free download from Microsoft.

~Pease, which version is this ERD Commander?
and does it work with vista/seven?
thx

Microsoft no longer offers demos or any version ERD Commander or any of the Desktop Analysis and Recovery Tools (DART) for free download. Only BIG Enterprise customers can get it directly from MS or it's available via Technet and MSDN paid subscriptions.
Does'nt support windows vista buisness edition.
